SEARCH
Package org.example

Class GenerationController

java.lang.Object
codearise.openapispecgenerator.controller.GenerationController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") public class GenerationController extends Object
The REST controller that contains the stepper functionalities and the corresponding endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • getOpenAPISpec

      @GetMapping("/export.yml") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> getOpenAPISpec()
      The endpoint to fetch the generated OpenAPI specification.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the OpenAPI specification file as body.

    • parseDiagramElements

      @PostMapping("/parse-elements") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> parseDiagramElements(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      The endpoint to parse individual UML elements from an uploaded UML diagram file.
      Parameters:
      file - The uploaded UML diagram file.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the parsed individual UML elements as body.

    • renameElement

      @PostMapping("/rename-element") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> renameElement(@RequestBody Map<String,String> renameInfo)
      The endpoint to rename an element of an uploaded UML diagram.
      Parameters:
      renameInfo - Map containing the type, old name, and new name of the element to rename.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the result of the rename operation as body, which consists of the old and new element values.

    • deleteElement

      @PostMapping("/delete-element") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteElement(@RequestBody Map<String,String> deleteInfo)
      The endpoint to delete an element from the uploaded UML diagram or from the elements added by the user.
      Parameters:
      deleteInfo - Map for the elemented that is removed, in which the key is the name of the element and the value is the type of the element.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the result of the delete operation as body, which consists of the old and new element values.

    • generateOpenAPISpec

      @PostMapping(value="/generate", consumes="multipart/form-data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> generateOpenAPISpec(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam("selectedHttpMethods") String selectedHttpMethodsJson)
      The endpoint to generate an OpenAPI specification based on the uploaded UML diagram file and the modifications done by the user.
      Parameters:
      file - The uploaded UML diagram file.
      selectedHttpMethodsJson - a JSON string containing the HTTP methods the user selected in the table of the Manage Elements step of the stepper.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the generated OpenAPI specification as body.

    • applyMappings

      @PostMapping("/apply-mappings") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> applyMappings(@RequestBody List<Map<String,Object>> mappings)
      The endpoint to apply the elements the user has added and/or modified in the Mapping step of the stepper.
      Parameters:
      mappings - A list that contains all the elements the user has added and all the existing elements of the uploaded UML diagram.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the result of the operation in which the mappings and modifications were applied as body.

    • addNewElement

      @PostMapping("/add-new-element") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNewElement(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> newElement)
      The endpoint to add a new element to the collection of existing elements of the uploaded UML diagram and the elements added by the user.
      Parameters:
      newElement - Map that contains the values of the newly added element.
      Returns:
      The HTTP response containing the result of the addition operation as body.
